Articles.Content:
In this version of SSOMP, we are building a spaceplane!

Guidelines:

The craft must be able to take off (and land) on le runway.

It has to 'see space'

Parts can be no bigger than 0.625 meters

Points:

Launch! - 0.000000000000000 points

Land at an anomaly- 10 points

Land at KSC2 - 25 points

Land at the North Pole - 15 points

Suborbital - 10 points

Orbital - 15 points

SSTO - +10 points

MÃƒÂ¼n it up - 20 points

Minmus! - 25 points

Kerbol orbit - 30 points

Visit an inner planet ( Duna and Inwards excluding kerbin) - 35 points

Land on an inner planet or its mÃƒÂ¼n - 45 points

Visit an outer planet (beyond Duna) - 45 points

Land on an outer planet or its mÃƒÂ¼ns - 30 points

Escape kerbol - 50 points

Optimal gravity assist - 35 points

Return to kerbin - 40 points

Land on launch pad - 35 points

Land on runway - 35 points

Land on VAB - 40 points

Land at KSC - 20 points

Land anywhere else - 10 points

Manned mission - +7 points

SECRET PUG ACHIEVEMENT - 42 points

Leader board:

5.(THIS COULD BE YE)

4.(THIS COULD BE YE)

3.(THIS COULD BE YE)
